user.title: CardDAV Birthday Calendar
user.description:
Connect to your iCloud contacts to show birthdays in Home Assistant.

**Important:** Use an **app-specific password**, not your regular Apple ID password.
Create one at [appleid.apple.com]({app_password_url}) → Sign-In and Security → App-Specific Passwords.

error.cannot_connect: Cannot connect to iCloud. Check your internet connection.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid credentials. Make sure you use an app-specific password, not your regular Apple ID password.
error.unknown: Unexpected error. Check the Home Assistant logs.

abort.already_configured: This Apple ID is already configured.

data.show_age: Show age in event title (e.g. 'John turns 35')
